name: chainworks-foodprovenance
description: A network to track a restaurant's raw ingredients from seed to sale

scripts.resetAllFabric: rm -rf ~/.composer/cards && rm -rf ~/.composer/client-data && npm run shutdownFabric && npm run bootFabric && ./fabric-tools/createPeerAdminCard.sh
scripts.startNetwork: composer network start --networkName chainworks-foodprovenance --networkVersion 0.0.1 --networkAdmin admin --networkAdminEnrollSecret adminpw --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 -f networkadmin.card
scripts.deployNetwork: npm run prepublish && npm run installNetwork && npm run startNetwork && npm run importCard && npm run pingNetwork
scripts.updateNetwork: npm run prepublish && composer network update -a ./dist/chainworks-foodprovenance.bna -c admin@chainworks-foodprovenance && npm run pingNetwork
scripts.resetAndStart: npm run resetAllFabric && npm run deployNetwork && npm run startServer

author: Chainworks LLC
